Html:
My program is based of the music store tutorial.  Although I'm fairly new I the completeness of the book. I also have the PDF tutorial. I'm trying to avoid my users from having to select from a dropdownlist every time they make changes to a form.  I would
 like for the form data to persist including dropdownlist values instead of always defaulting to the first item in the list.  Can someone please point me in the right direction? Thanks
